channel.description: This has to be the best book ever. http://www.scratchfactory.com/Resources/LavaBanners/LavaRules.pdf It is actually surprisingly accurate and insightful. Yeah, it has been around for some months, but the rules remain as relevant as ever. I particularly like how they detailed the different way it applies in D&D as opposed to World of Darkness.
